Source code for kafe.constants

'''
.. module:: constants
   :platform: Unix
   :synopsis: A submodule defining some constants used by the fit package.

.. moduleauthor:: Daniel Savoiu <daniel.savoiu@ekp.kit.edu>
'''

# (G) Constants related to the graphical output
#################################################

G_PADDING_FACTOR_X = 1.2    #: make plot view slightly larger than the data span
G_PADDING_FACTOR_Y = 1.2    #: make plot view slightly larger than the data span
G_PLOT_POINTS = 10 #200         #: number of plot points for plotting the function

# (M) Related to the behavior of TMinuit
#################################################

M_TOLERANCE = 0.1           #: I{Minuit} tolerance level
M_MAX_ITERATIONS = 6000     #: Maximum I{Minuit} iterations until aborting the process
M_MAX_X_FIT_ITERATIONS = 2  #: Number of maximal additional iterations for I{x} fit (0 disregards I{x} errors), default = 2

# (F) Output number format preferences
#################################################

F_SIGNIFICANCE = 2
'''
Set significance for returning results and errors
N = rounding error to N significant digits and value
to the same order of magnitude as the error
'''
                            
# Other constants
#################################################

DERIVATIVE_SPACING = 0.01   #: spacing to use when computing function derivatives
